name: cek-pascabayar
title: Check Tlpn & TV Pascabayar
description: Melakukan pengecekan tagihan telepon pascabayar berdasarkan nomor pelanggan.
curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/cek-pascabayar \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
